title: Ep 97: The 2nd Annual Forever35 Gift Guide
itunes:title: Ep 97: The 2nd Annual Forever35 Gift Guide
itunes:subtitle: Kate goes on a getaway with her husband and comes back refreshed, but now has a cold that she’s fending off with nine hours of sleep. Doree gets balayage and has a revelation about her relationship to her hair. Then it’s time for the annual Forever35 G...
description:
Kate goes on a getaway with her husband and comes back refreshed, but now has a cold that she’s fending off with nine hours of sleep. Doree gets balayage and has a revelation about her relationship to her hair. Then it’s time for the annual Forever35 Gift Guide! We’ve got presents for everyone on your list and maybe a few for yourself, too.


To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:


  • Fabletics. Go to Fabletics.com/forever35 to get 2 leggings for only $24.
  • HelloFresh. To receive 9 FREE HelloFresh meals, visit HelloFresh.com/forever90 and enter promo code forever90.
  • Native. For 20% off your first purchase visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.
  • Figs. For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to WEARFIGS.COM and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.
  • LiquidIV. Get 25% off at LiquidIV.com when you use our code FOREVER35 at checkout.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
